metadata.name: Travel Alone
metadata.description:
Genesis on Ethereum Blockchain /  
"Travel Alone" is a meditation on reassembly and transformation, an endless dance of chaos and order.  
My anonymous subject strive for peace and integrity, simultaneously being reconstructed and polarised again and again.

And I believe on this path of reflecting on our personal truth we are lonely travellers"

Thanks to Mahdi Shirzadkhan who created this mesmerising video and sound design so this concept became truly alive.


Original painting:  
Travel Alone by Yulia Bas  
38 x 46 cm ,  
Oil on cardboard 3D collage mounted on wooden panel, 
2022

3D motion Animation:  
Mahdi Shirzadkhan (MSYDesign),  
Rendering in Cinema 4D - Redshift,  
Post production in After Effects - Final Cut Pro, 
Sound Design Adobe Audition,  
Output Resolution 4000 x 4250 pixel,  
H.264, MPEG-4 AAC
